kusadasiInfo.title: Important Information for Kusadasi - Izmir Daily Tours
kusadasiInfo.item1: All SIC (Seat in Coach) Tours are operational everyday between 15th April – 15th October, except Pergamon Acropol – operates on Tuesday – Saturday on SIC (Seat in Coach) basis
kusadasiInfo.item2: During the tours, the pickups & drop offs from airports require arrivals no later than 08:30 am, departures no earlier than 20:00 hrs
kusadasiInfo.item3: All tours are accompanied by a Professional English-Speaking Tour Guide, any other language will be charged separately and operated on PVT (Private) basis only
kusadasiInfo.item4: Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese will require EUR 100.- / per tour
kusadasiInfo.item5: All tours will be operated with A/C Deluxe Mercedes Sprinter or same category vehicles
kusadasiInfo.item6: All entrance fees, parking fees, toll fees as per following itineraries are included in the given prices
kusadasiInfo.item7: All Full Day Tours are inclusive of local lunch
kusadasiInfo.item8: 70% no-show applied to tour and transfer cancellations within 24 hours to departure
kusadasiInfo.item9: All clients arriving to Izmir airport and depart directly for tours, need to pay EUR 20.- / per person / supplement cost / one way
kusadasiInfo.item10: Pick up times will be given one day prior to departure by our office

header.title: About Funny Tourism
header.subtitle: Your trusted partner for unforgettable Turkey experiences since 2014

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2014, Funny Tourism has been dedicated to creating memorable travel experiences across Turkey. What started as a passion for sharing Turkey's rich culture and stunning landscapes has grown into a trusted tourism company serving travelers from around the world.
story.paragraph2: We specialize in custom-designed tours that showcase the best of Turkey - from the historic streets of Istanbul to the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia, from the ancient ruins of Ephesus to the stunning beaches of the Mediterranean coast. Our expert team knows Turkey inside and out, and we're passionate about sharing it with you.
story.paragraph3: With over a decade of experience, TURSAB license 7747, and hundreds of satisfied travelers, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service, competitive prices, and authentic experiences that you'll remember for a lifetime.
